headline: Is Norfolk Southern (NSC) Priced Fairly After Recent Rail Safety Scrutiny?
summary: If you are wondering whether Norfolk Southern's current share price lines up with its underlying value, this article will walk through what the available numbers actually say. The stock recently closed at US$290.63, with returns of 1.2% over the last 7 days, a 0.3% decline over the last 30 days, 1.0% year to date and 21.0% over the past year, as well as 22.7% over 3 years and 32.0% over 5 years. Recent headlines around Norfolk Southern have largely focused on regulatory and operational...
